label: 靴沓
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Black lacquered cowhide boots with curved toes, metal buckles, and brocade tops, worn with ceremonial dress on occasions such as Imperial progresses and journeys of other members of the Imperial family (p. 583n).
